Package studentinfo.project3

Class Enrollment

java.lang.Object
studentinfo.project3.Enrollment
public class Enrollment extends Object
This class contains methods that perform actions that replicate a student enrollment roster
Author:
Steven Tan, David Fabian

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Enrollment()
    Constructs an instance of the Enrollment object Holds the student enrollment array and the current size of the student enrollment roster

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    add(EnrollStudent enrollStudent)
    Adds a student to the end of the enrollment roster If a student has been added and the roster is full, the size of the roster is increased by 4
    void
    clear()
    Clears the enrollment roster
    boolean
    contains(EnrollStudent enrollStudent)
    Checks if a student is in the enrollment roster
    EnrollStudent
    enrolledStudent(EnrollStudent findStudent)
    Retrieves the enrolled student on the enrollment list with an identical Profile as the given student.
    private int
    find(EnrollStudent student)
    Searches whether a given student is in the enrollment roster If the student is not found in the roster, -1 is returned.
    private void
    grow()
    Increases the array capacity by 4 This method will be called when the enrollment roster is full after a student has been recently added
    boolean
    isEmpty()
    Checks whether the roster array is empty.
    EnrollStudent[]
    list()
    Returns the list of enrolled students.
    String
    print()
    Prints the list of enrolled students.
    void
    remove(EnrollStudent enrollStudent)
    Removes the student requested in the parameter The student in the last index is swapped with the index of the student to be removed
    int
    size()
    Returns the number of currently enrolled students.

  • Field Details

    • enrollStudents

      private EnrollStudent[] enrollStudents

    • size

      private int size

  • Constructor Details

    • Enrollment

      public Enrollment()
      Constructs an instance of the Enrollment object Holds the student enrollment array and the current size of the student enrollment roster

  • Method Details

    • find

      private int find(EnrollStudent student)
      Searches whether a given student is in the enrollment roster If the student is not found in the roster, -1 is returned. If the student is found in the roster, the index of the student is returned.
      Parameters:
      student - the student that is to be found
      Returns:
      -1 the student is not found, the index of the student otherwise

    • grow

      private void grow()
      Increases the array capacity by 4 This method will be called when the enrollment roster is full after a student has been recently added

    • add

      public void add(EnrollStudent enrollStudent)
      Adds a student to the end of the enrollment roster If a student has been added and the roster is full, the size of the roster is increased by 4
      Parameters:
      enrollStudent - the student that is to be added

    • remove

      public void remove(EnrollStudent enrollStudent)
      Removes the student requested in the parameter The student in the last index is swapped with the index of the student to be removed
      Parameters:
      enrollStudent - the student that is to be removed

    • contains

      public boolean contains(EnrollStudent enrollStudent)
      Checks if a student is in the enrollment roster
      Parameters:
      enrollStudent - the student that is to be added
      Returns:
      true the student is in the roster, false if the student is not in the roster otherwise

    • list

      public EnrollStudent[] list()
      Returns the list of enrolled students. Only used for printing.
      Returns:
      the array of currently enrolled students.

    • enrolledStudent

      public EnrollStudent enrolledStudent(EnrollStudent findStudent)
      Retrieves the enrolled student on the enrollment list with an identical Profile as the given student.
      Parameters:
      findStudent - the EnrolledStudent object used to find an identical one in the enrollment list.
      Returns:
      the instance identical to the one given; if there is none that is identical, null is returned.

    • print

      public String print()
      Prints the list of enrolled students.
      Returns:
      a String representation of all the students currently enrolled

    • size

      public int size()
      Returns the number of currently enrolled students.
      Returns:
      the size of this enrollment list.

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Checks whether the roster array is empty.
      Returns:
      true if the size of the roster is 0; false otherwise.

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Clears the enrollment roster
